name: Eblion
description:
"You must defeat oblivion, otherwise all hope is lost"

Eblion is an adventure platformer that was originally built for the Geta Game Jam 9.

Light and dark. Pure and Corrupt. Eblion and Oblivion. All are polar opposites. And one in each group always prevails. That is the way of this world. You play as Eblion, the only pure spirit in all of the temple of Threena. You must adventure around the temple, purifying all your comerades (now known as the Corrupted), while trying to stop the evil Oblivion from taking over.

We hope you enjoy!

On the 3rd stage, please unlock the locked key first instead of proceeding to move the moveable block. There is a bug that when you move the block onto the pressure plate, the game won't let you unlock the key.

Thanks for your patience!
